content.text: table is designed to manage and categorize different types of budget versus expenditure records. It serves as a reference table that supports a larger budgeting and financial management system. The table includes metadata about each expenditure type, such as descriptions, hierarchy information, and display order, which can be used for reporting and organizational purposes.

This table is crucial for categorizing and managing different expenditure types within a budgeting system. It can be used to:
Define and manage various expenditure categories.
Support hierarchical categorization of expenditures, allowing for detailed reporting and analysis.
Track changes and updates to expenditure types, including who made changes and when.
Facilitate user-specific or role-specific views of budget data, using the
